nodes.text: The Natalon system was a star system that was located within the Piryn Shar sector, a part of the galaxy's Expansion Region. The Great Gran Run hyperlane connected it to the Noe'ha'on and Har systems.
The Natalon system was the origin point of Natalon Core Bandits. The Human smuggler Han Solo was involved in a shootout within the system at some point between 14 BBY and 0 BBY.
The Natalon system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-16.
